GSP33nysu__3u:3353: yadi svapno 'ntardhatte kathaṃ tarhi punastatpratītiriṣyata āha- vyajyate ceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3357: vyaktistirodhānaṃ ca na jñāyata ityato 'dhikaraṇadvayārthamupasaṃharati- sṛṣṭvaiveti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3371: tadabhāvo nāḍīṣu tacchruter ātmani ca / BBs_3,2.7 /
GSP33nysu__3u:3374: // oṃ tadabhāvo nāḍīṣu tacchaterātmani ha oṃ //
GSP33nysu__3u:3377: atra yajjīvabrahmaṇorekatvaṃ pareṇa varṇitaṃ tatsūtrākṣarāpratītaṃ tadviruddhaṃ cāpekṣaṇīyameveti jñāpayitumadhikaraṇatrayasya tātparyamāha- suṣuptīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3382: svatantro 'pīśvaro līlayā tāni kāraṇānyupādāya jīvaṃ tadvaśatāṃ nītvā suṣuptyādikaṃ prāpayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:3387: // oṃ sa eva ca karmānusmṛtiśabdavidhibhyaḥ oṃ //
GSP33nysu__3u:3390: sa evottiṣṭhatyutānyo 'pīti saṃśaye mahājalanidhau kṣiptasyodabindoriva brahmaṇaikībhūtasyoddharaṇāsambhavādaniyama iti prāpte samādhīyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:3399: svapnādīnāṃ parameśvarakṛtatve 'bhihite kiṃ deśakālāntare 'nyo 'pi kartāstyuteśvara eveti saṃśaye laukikeśvarāṇāṃ deśakālavyavasthayaiśvaryadarśanādayamapi tathāvidha iti prāpte /
GSP33nysu__3u:3400: sa eveśvaro 'sya svapnādeḥ kartā natu deśakālāntare 'nyaḥ kaścanetyeṣa evārtho 'tra pratipādyata iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:3401: nahi yaḥ suptaḥ sa evottiṣṭhatyanyo veti kasyacitsaṃśayo 'sti /
GSP33nysu__3u:3402: naca suptasya brahmaṇaikyaṃ pramāṇadṛṣṭamiṣyaṃ vā parasyeti yatkiñcidetat /
GSP33nysu__3u:3404: sūtrakṛtā ca svapnādivanna mohaḥ svatantrāvastheti jñāpanāya vyavadhānaṃ kṛtamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:3410: // oṃ na sthānato 'pi parasyobhayaliṅgaṃ sarvatra hi oṃ //
GSP33nysu__3u:3412: dvirūpaṃ brahma śrūyate sarvakarmā sarvakāma ityādau saviśeṣamasthūlamanaṇvityādau nirviśeṣam /
GSP33nysu__3u:3415: kiṃ saviśeṣamuta nirviśeṣamiti saṃśaye dvividhaśrutyanurodhādubhayarūpameva brahmeti prāpte idamucyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:3416: na tāvatsvata eva parasya brahmaṇa ubhayarūpatvaṃ sambhavati virodhāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:3427: neha nānāsti kiñcanetyādau bhedadarśananindāpūrvakamabhedameke śākhinaḥ samāmanantīti /
GSP33nysu__3u:3428: tadidaṃ vyākhyānaṃ samyagvyākhyānenaivāpahastitaṃ bhaviṣyati kiṃ punaḥ prayatnenetyāśayavānvyākhyānamevārabhate /
GSP33nysu__3u:3432: tatra sarvatra sthitaḥ kimeka evota parasparaṃ bhinna iti saṃśaye yadyugapadbhinnasthānaṃ tadbhinnaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33nysu__3u:3435: bhinnānāṃ ca tāratamyamanugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvaścopalabdha iti tatprasaṅgo 'pīti kathaṃ sa eva cetyuktamiti prāpte prativihitaṃ sūtrakṛtā na sthānato 'pīti /
GSP33nysu__3u:3437: na sthānato 'pi parasyobhayaliṅgaṃ sarvatra hi / BBs_3,2.11 /
GSP33nysu__3u:3438: na sthānabhedato 'pyasya bhedaḥ kaścit pareśituḥ // MAnuv_3,2.103ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:3445: sthānānāṃ suranarādiśarīrāṇāṃ tatrāpi dakṣiṇākṣyādīnāṃ bhede satyapyasya tatra tatra sthitasya pareśituḥ kaścit anyonyābhāvalakṣaṇo hīnādhikatvarūpo 'nugrāhyānugrāhakatvarūpo vā,
GSP33nysu__3u:3447: kuta ityataḥ sarvatra hītyuktaṃ vyācaṣṭe- sarvatreti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3457: ityādau paramātmā śrūyate yata iti śeṣaḥ / *9,362*
GSP33nysu__3u:3458: oṃ na bhedāditi cenna pratyekamatadvacanāt oṃ //
GSP33nysu__3u:3460: nirbhedaṃ sarvatra sarvadoṣadūraṃ sakalaguṇaparipūrṇaṃ brahmeti nopapadyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:3464: na bhedād iti cen na pratyekam atadvacanāt / BBs_3,2.12 /
GSP33nysu__3u:3465: tadviruddhaṃ tu yat tatra mānaṃ naiva bhavet kvacit // MAnuv_3,2.104ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:3467: yattu vākyaṃ tasyoktārthasya viruddhaṃ pratīyate tattatra uktaviruddhe kvacidarthe mānaṃ naiva bhavetkintvanya eva tasyārthaḥ pratipattavyaḥ
GSP33nysu__3u:3474: sakalasmṛtītihāsapurāṇānāṃ parameśvarasyāśeṣadoṣadūratve samastaguṇaparipūrṇatve ca yanmahātātparyaṃ tadvirodhena tat vākyaṃ atra bhagavato doṣitvādau kathaṃ mānaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__3u:3480: yadi parameśvarasya sakalaguṇaparipūrṇatve nirastasamastadoṣatve ca vedādīnāṃ mahātātparyamityarthaḥ pramāṇavānsyāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:3481: tadeva tu na paśyāma ityata āha- duḥkheti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3494: tatra yadā viṣayaḥ sandigdhaḥ prayojanaṃ ca niścitaṃ tadā,
GSP33nysu__3u:3498: tathāca tatprayojanaṃ yasminjñāpite sampadyate sa eva viṣayo 'vadhāryate /
GSP33nysu__3u:3503: ataḥ sa eva viṣayaḥ kalpanīyo yasminjñā(pi)
GSP33nysu__3u:3511: astu tarhi sa eva viṣayaḥ kiṃ guṇapūrṇatvādinetyata uktaṃ prasannādeva nānyathā na jñātamātrāditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:3516: viṣṇoḥ prasannatā ca tadīyaguṇotkarṣajñānādeva kevalaṃ nirdeṣatāparijñānācca bhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:3524: syādetadyadi tadīśānādityādinoktaṃ prāmāṇikaṃ syādityatastatrāgamavākyānyudāharati- yo māmiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3526: jānātyasmai prasanno 'haṃ dadyāṃ muktiṃ nacānyathā // MAnuv_3,2.107 //
GSP33nysu__3u:3527: yo māmaśeṣābhyadhikaṃ vijānāti sa eva mām /
GSP33nysu__3u:3528: vijānātyakhilāṃstasya dadyāṃ kāmān paraṃ padam // MAnuv_3,2.108 //
GSP33nysu__3u:3529: yo māmevamasammūḍhaḥ kiṃ mā nindanti śatravaḥ // MAnuv_3,2.109ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:3544: idamekameka asmi niṣṣāḷabhī dvā kimau trayaḥ karanti /
GSP33nysu__3u:3545: khale na parṣānprati hanmi bhūri kimmā nindanti śatravo 'nindrā'; (ṛ.10-48-7)
GSP33nysu__3u:3547: idamekaṃ viśvaṃ abhi prati ahameko niṣpaḷasmi nitarāṃ sahata iti niṣpāṭ dvau prapañcāvabhi prati ahameko niṣṣāḷasmi /
GSP33nysu__3u:3548: trayo 'pi prapañcā mama kimeva kurvanti na kimapi mamāniṣyaṃ kartumīśate /
GSP33nysu__3u:3549: kintvahameva khala iva khalasthitāni dhānyānīva bhūri bhūrīnbahūnbahuvaraṃ vā tānniṣṭhurānnindakānpratihanmi tasmādanīśvarāste śatravo māṃ kiṃ nindantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:3561: lokataśca prasādena muktiḥ sa guṇavedanāt // MAnuv_3,2.110ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:3583: arthaḥ svayaṃ vinirṇīto vāsudevena sādaram // MAnuv_3,2.111d-f //
GSP33nysu__3u:3589: etad buddhvā buddhimān syāt kṛtakṛtyaśca bhārata // MAnuv_3,2.112 //
GSP33nysu__3u:3592: iti yanmayā mama puruṣottamatvādikamuktaṃ idaṃ guhyatamaṃ śāstraṃ tātparyeṇa sarvaśāstraiḥ pratipādyo 'rthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:3611: // oṃ ata eva copamā sūryakādivat oṃ //
GSP33nysu__3u:3618: yo yadaṃśaḥ sa tadabhinno yatheśvarāṃśā matsyādistadabhinna iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:3619: ato bhinnābhinnā brahmaṇā jīva ityevaṃ prāpte prativihitaṃ sūtrakṛtā sūryakādivaditi sūtrakhaṇḍena /
GSP33nysu__3u:3620: tadetaddṛṣṭāntavacanamātraṃ na kasyacidarthasya sādhakaṃ bādhakaṃ vetyataḥ pūvarpakṣaniṣedhapūrvakaṃ pratijñāhetū darśayati- naceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3634: jīvo brahmābhinno na bhavati tadābhāsatvādyo yadābhāso nāsau tadabhinno yathāsūryakādiḥ sūryādinetyanumānavirodhāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:3641: chāyā yathā puṃsadṛśā pumādhīnā ca dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:3644: ābhāsa eva puruṣā muktāśca paramātmanaḥ // MAnuv_3,2.116 // *9,376*
GSP33nysu__3u:3650: ca sākṣātkintu pāramparyeṇeti svarūpakathanāya śrutidvayaṃ paṭhati- chāyā viṣṇoriti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3651: chāyā viṣṇo ramā tasyāśchāyā dhātā viśeṣakau /
GSP33nysu__3u:3673: ityādiśrutivākyebhyo jñāyate bheda eva hi // MAnuv_3,2.119ef //
GSP33nysu__3u:3675: jīvasya parameśvarābhāsatvaṃ jñāyate tenātyantabhedaśca jñāyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:3679: iti sūtrāvayavaṃ vyākhyātuṃ tannivartanīyāmāśaṅkāmāha- ābhāsatvaṃ hīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3683: yajjīvasya paramātmana ābhāsatvaṃ śrutibalena nirṇītaṃ tadyuktiviruddham /
GSP33nysu__3u:3692: tathāpi kuto na yuktamityata āha- upādhīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3703: darpaṇādinā sannikṛṣṭāḥ pratihatāḥ parāvṛttā nāyanaraśmayo mukhena sannikṛṣṭāstadeva viṣayīkurvanti /
GSP33nysu__3u:3705: tatra vyavacchedaḥ parāktvaṃ savyetaravyatyāsaścetyādikaṃ bhrāntyaiva pratīyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:3706: sopādhikaścāyaṃ bhrama iti yāvadupādhibhāvaṃ na nivartate /
GSP33nysu__3u:3710: evamābhāsatvānumāne duṣye kim iti cennirābādhena prāguktānumānadvayenaikyaṃ siddhamityāha- cetanatveneti // *9,379*
GSP33nysu__3u:3714: aikyaṃ ca sādhyamānaṃ na māyāvādināmivetyuktam- samudāyeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3718: atyantābhedaṃ parityajya samudāyaikyaṃ kuto 'ṅgīkriyata ityata āha- ata iti // *9,380*
GSP33nysu__3u:3721: samudāyaikyāṅgīkārato yacchatyādyuktaṃ pṛthaktvaṃ tatsamudāyasya tadaṃśasya ca jīvasya bhavet /
GSP33nysu__3u:3740: jīvāstu brahmaṇoṃ'śāścitsvabhāvā vahneriva viṣphuliṅgā ata eva brahmaṇo bhinnābhinnāḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:3746: yathā bhagavadrūpāṇāṃ matsyādīnāṃ samudāye bhagavatsaṃjñā na sthānato 'pītyādau siddhāntinoditā tathā /
GSP33nysu__3u:3747: etenātyantābhedaṃ parityajya bhedābhedāṅgīkāre śrutidvayamivāṃśatvānumānaṃ coktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:3748: yadi matsyādayaḥ parameśvarasyeva jīvā brahmaṇoṃ'śāḥ syustadā matsyādīnāmaiśvaryādivajjīvānāṃ nirduḥkhatvādikaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:3750: kiñca yadi jīvasya brahmaṇābhedo 'pi paramārthaḥ syāttadā brahmaiva bhavatītyuktā muktirayuktā syādityata āha- ata iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3760: yata evamaupādhika eva bhedo 'to jñānakarmābhyāṃ dehādyupādhīnāmātyantike 'pāye sati jīvānāmīśarūpaiḥ samatā bhavet /
GSP33nysu__3u:3762: tathā jīvā apyanuṣyitajñānakarmasamuccayāḥ prārabdhakarmāvasāne dehādyupādhibhiratyantavimuktāḥ svābhāvikaṃ brahmatvamāpadyanta iti na kaściddoṣaḥ
GSP33nysu__3u:3776: yadi jīvānāmupādhyāyattatā syāttarhyupādhināśe sūryakādīnāmiva teṣāṃ nāśitā bhavet /
GSP33nysu__3u:3777: athopādhayo 'vināśinastadā pratyakṣādivirodhaḥ sarvadā saṃsāritvaṃ ca syādityubhayathā mokṣaśāstravaiyarthyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:3784: etāvadeva vākyametadāśaṅkānirāsārthaṃ na punaridaṃ sūtrasya pratīkagrahaṇamiti evaśabdaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:3787: yata evāyamātmā caitanyasvarūpo nirviśeṣo vāṅmanasātītaḥ parapratiṣedhopadeśyo 'ta
GSP33nysu__3u:3796: anyasmātsūryakāderābhāsājjīvānāṃ viśeṣitāṃ vilakṣaṇatāṃ anena sūtrakhaṇḍenāha sūtrakāraḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:3800: jīvasya sadṛśatvaṃ ca cittvamātraṃ nacāparam // MAnuv_3,2.125 // *9,386*
GSP33nysu__3u:3810: idānīmata eva copameti vākyaṃ yojayati- tāvanmātreṇa ceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3815: jīva iti vaktavye eṣāṃ cidātmanāṃ rūpamiti vacanaṃ mukteṣvidaṃ dvayamastīti darśayitum /
GSP33nysu__3u:3817: ābhāsatvaṃ sūryakādyupamā cokteti svābhiprāyaprakaṭanaṃ sūtrāthar ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:3825: anyathā prameyatvādimātrasāmyasya sarvatra sambhavena maśako 'pi mātaṅgasya dṛṣṭāntaḥ syādityata āha- nātisāmyamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3828: nidarśyate sādhyena sādhanasya vyāptiratreti hi nidarśanam /
GSP33nysu__3u:3846: na copādhyadhīnatvena vyāpto yena tadvayāvṛttyā vyāvarteta /
GSP33nysu__3u:3869: yadi ca jalādinā pratihatā nayanaraśmayo mukhamīkṣante tadā śilādipratihatā apīkṣeran /
GSP33nysu__3u:3873: nanu brahmābhāsaśabdo jīvasya brahmādhīnatāṃ brahmasadṛśatāṃ ca kayā vṛttyā vakti /
GSP33nysu__3u:3875: evaṃ tarhyasmadāyatte śabdaprayoge 'vācakaṃ kimiti prayokṣyāmaha iti prayojanaṃ vācyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:3878: tata ābhāsate nityaṃ tadvadābhāsate 'pi ca // MAnuv_3,2.127cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:3880: jīva ābhāsa uddiṣṭaḥ sadaiva paramātmanaḥ // MAnuv_3,2.128 // *9,396*
GSP33nysu__3u:3882: tena paramātmanā nimittenābhāsate pratīto bhavatīti pratītau tadadhīnatvamucyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:3893: yataḥ kāraṇāttataḥ paramātmana eva jīvasya bhavatastataḥ kāraṇādityāvṛttyā yojyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:3906: yaduktamityādinokta evārthastata ābhāsata ityādinā prapañcita ityadoṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:3917: ābhāsa eva ceti sūtrakāroktasya brahmābhāsatvasyātra hetutvena vivakṣitatvāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:3919: buddhisannidhānāttatra kartavya evāyaṃ carco 'tra kṛta iti na kaściddoṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:3935: bāhyopādhirlayaṃ yāti muktāvanyasya tu sthitiḥ'; iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:3947: caḥ kiñcitsādṛśyamityubhāvarthadvayaṃ samprakāśayataḥ avadhārayata iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:3959: yadyata evetyetāvadevocyeta tadekasyaivārthasyāyaṃ parāmarśo na dvitayasya parāmarśo dvitīyaparāmarśe'pi militasya hetutvamiti jñāyeta /
GSP33nysu__3u:3960: avadhāraṇadvayaprayoge tu tadanyathānupapattyā pratyekaṃ hetubhūtārthadvayaparāmarśo vijñāyate /

GSP33nysu__3u:3978: yathā hi stambhe kumbhatādātmyābhāvaḥ pratyakṣastathā'tmani sārvajñādilakṣaṇabrahmatādātmyābhāvaḥ sākṣiṇā siddha eva /
GSP33nysu__3u:3984: sarvopeteti kathitamata aikyaṃ kva doṣiṇā // MAnuv_3,2.131ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:3990: sarvopetā ca taddarśanāditi sarvaśaktitvena hetunā brahmaṇo 'śeṣadoṣarāhityasya samarthitatvāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:3998: yadyaśeṣaśaktiyuktaḥ paramātmāṅgīkṛtastadā tasyopādhau tannimitte ca svātantryātkathaṃ tannimittadoṣavānsyāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:4000: bhavatu vānena prakārabhedena virodhaśāntirmā vā bhūt /
GSP33nysu__3u:4003: antaḥkaraṇādayupādhayo 'vidyānimittamittāni ca svaśaktyā paramātmānaṃ vicchidya tadaṃśasya jīvasya duḥkhādidoṣānkurvantīti tāvanna yujyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:4005: ataḥ paramātmaiva sarvaśaktiḥ svādhīnaireva taiḥ svātmānaṃ vicchidya svāṃśaṃ jīvaṃ duḥkhādidoṣayoginaṃ karotīti mantavyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:4015: ataḥ paramapuruṣasya na kenāpi prakāreṇa doṣasaṃsargo yujyata iti na doṣiṇā jīvena tasyaikyaṃ yuktamiti / *9,409*
GSP33nysu__3u:4017: tathā coktena prakārabhedena virodhaśāntirbhaviṣyatīti bhāvena śaṅkate- anusandhāneti //
GSP33nysu__3u:4027: brahmāpi cejjīvagataṃ duḥkhādikaṃ nānusandadhyāttadā tayorekatā nāstītyevoktaprāyaṃ syāt kathamityata āha- cetaneti //
GSP33nysu__3u:4034: mā hi bhūddhūmābhāvo 'gnyabhāva ityata uktam- naivāparamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:4035: nanvasti ghaṭasya ghaṭenaikyaṃ na tvanusandhānaṃ tatkathametadityata uktam- cetaneti //
GSP33nysu__3u:4039: ata eva hi mamātmā bhadrasena iti vākyamanusandhānābhāvena bādhyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:4041: naca prāgbhavīyaduḥkhādyanusandhānamidānīṃ nāstyasti caikyamiti vyabhicāraḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ /

GSP33nysu__3u:11076: prāsaṅgikaṃ tu nirākaraṇaṃ tatra vātra vā na kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11080: kiñcātra jñānasvarūpanirūpaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati tatprasaṅgaśca jñānapāde samucitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11083: tarhi tatraivāyaṃ granthasandarbhaḥ kuto na niveśita iti cet /
GSP33nysu__3u:11088: teṣāṃ ca parasparaṃ bhedastakālavartināṃ puruṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣeṇa dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:11095: vedādhidoṣāśca pratyakṣeṇekṣyanta iti na bhagavato nirdeṣatvamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11096: tatra tāvadbhedasya pratyakṣasiddhatāṃ nirākartumāgamavākyaṃ paṭhati- naceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11102: anyeṣāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ yathānekatvātirikto 'nyonyābhāvalakṣaṇo bhedo dṛśyate na tatheti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11103: viṣṇau bhedo na dṛśyata ityevokte 'nekatvasyāpyadarśanaṃ pratīyeta tadarthamidaṃ vacanam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11104: yadvā yathā viṣṇāvanyapratiyogiko bhedo dṛśyate na tathā svapratiyogika iti yojanā /
GSP33nysu__3u:11105: anyathā ghaṭādipratiyogiko 'pi bhedo na dṛśyata ityapi pratīyeta /
GSP33nysu__3u:11109: adhunātanairbhedo na dṛśyata iti parasyāpi sammatam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11116: tatra daivaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tāvadavatārāṇāṃ parasparaṃ na bhedaṃ gocarayatīti bhāvaḥ / *11,186*
GSP33nysu__3u:11120: uttamānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ bhagavato bahurūpeṣu tadevedamityabhedaviṣayā pratyabhijñaiva purāṇādau dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:11121: yathā jāmbavataḥ sa rāma evāyaṃ kṛṣṇa iti pratyabhijñā /
GSP33nysu__3u:11124: tathā ca bahurūpeṣu pratyabhijñā na sambhavatyeva /
GSP33nysu__3u:11125: sambhavantī vā bhrāntiḥ syādityata āha- bahutvaṃ ceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11130: anyathāpyupapattipakṣe bhedasandehaḥ syātso 'pyaniṣya ityanyathaivopapattiṃ sūcayati- na bhedeneti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11137: evamuttamānāṃ puṃsāṃ bhagavadekarūpadarśanasamaye rūpāntarapratītāvasatyāṃ tato bhedajñānamasambhāvitam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11140: tathāpi madhyamādijanānāṃ pratyakṣaṃ bhagavadrūpabhede pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33nysu__3u:11144: pratyabhijñā ca yeṣāṃ na te 'pi tanmuṣyadṛṣṭayaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.132cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11147: yeṣāṃ tu madhyamānāṃ janānāṃ pratyabhijñā bhagavadrūpeṣu nāsti te 'pi tatra bhedaṃ naiva paśyantīti yojanā /
GSP33nysu__3u:11148: pratyabhijñābhāve kāraṇaṃ tena bhagavatā muṣyāpahatā dṛṣṭireṣāmiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11150: bhagavadicchāyā teṣāṃ yogyatayā copodbalitaṃ bahutvamupalabhyamānaṃ pratīyamāne('pi)
GSP33nysu__3u:11153: bhagavadrūpe bhedaṃ naiva paśyantītyukte ghaṭādibhyo 'pi bhedaṃ na paśyantīti mandasya pratītiḥ syāttāṃ nivārayitumāha- bhedamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11154: bhedaṃ naiva prapaśyanti bhedamanyebhya eva ca /
GSP33nysu__3u:11158: nanu pratīyamānaṃ vastudvayaṃ bhedena vā pratīyate 'bhedena vā /
GSP33nysu__3u:11159: bhedābhedodāsīnatayā tu pratītiḥ kathamityata āha- evamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11168: tathā parameśvaraśaktyātrāpi tathā pratītau ko virodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11178: purāṇameva vedasya kinna bādhakaṃ bhavatītyata āha- neti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11183: purāṇavacanaṃ khalu lokānāṃ yadbhagavadrūpeṣu bhedadarśanaṃ tadanuvādaparameva /
GSP33nysu__3u:11197: tarhi tadeva bhagavadrūpabhede pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatītyapi na vācyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11205: atha bhedadarśanamevābhedadarśanasya bādhakaṃ kuto na bhavatītyata āha- aparīkṣiteti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11212: parīkṣāpūrvaṃ darśanaṃ prāmāṇyaniścayo yasya pratyakṣasyeti vā /
GSP33nysu__3u:11214: tadanena yatparīkṣayā na niścitaprāmāṇyaṃ jñānaṃ na tannimittaprāmāṇyaṃ jñānāntaraṃ bādhata iti vyāptiruktā /
GSP33nysu__3u:11220: yathā yajñadattādāvaniściprāmāṇyā devadattādidṛṣṭirna niścitaprāmāṇyāṃ yajñadattādidṛṣṭiṃ bādhate tathetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11223: ato na tattasya bādhakaṃ kintu vaiparītyameveti vadāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11232: purāṇavākyaṃ ca kecidbhedaṃ paśyantīti vā pratipādayatu /
GSP33nysu__3u:11236: ataḥ pramāṇābhāvānna bhedadaśarnasya prāmāṇyaniścaya iti bhāvaḥ / *11,195*
GSP33nysu__3u:11240: dvitīyābhiprāyeṇa tu bhedasya darśana iti samāsaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11242: niścitaṃ parīkṣitaṃ ca tadbhedasyadarśanaṃ ceti tathoktam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11245: nniścitaprāmāṇyaṃ bhedadarśanaṃ na pratīyeta tarhi kīdṛśaṃ tatpratīyata ityata āha- sammugdhamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11266: idameva tasya bādhakaṃ kinna syādityata āha- aparīkṣitameveti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11268: parīkṣādarśane naiva dṛśyate kenacit kvacit // MAnuv_3,4.137 //
GSP33nysu__3u:11281: nanu doṣābhāvaviṣayaṃ mahatāṃ pratyakṣaṃ tāvatkutaḥ siddhamityata āha- nirdeṣameveti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11283: nirdoṣameva rudro 'drāṅ nirdoṣaṃ taṃ purandaraḥ // MAnuv_3,4.138 //
GSP33nysu__3u:11286: iti barkuśruteścaiva sadoṣaṃ nāsya darśanam // MAnuv_3,4.139 //
GSP33nysu__3u:11295: asya parameśvarasya viṣaye mahatāṃ darśanaṃ sadoṣaṃ doṣagrāhi naiva,
GSP33nysu__3u:11297: doṣadaśarnamaparīkṣitaṃ tadabhāvadarśanaṃ tu parīkṣitametatkuta ityata āha- aviddha iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11300: iti paiṅgiśrutiścaiva prāha nirdoṣatāṃ hareḥ // MAnuv_3,4.140 // *11,201*
GSP33nysu__3u:11310: parīkṣādarśane naiva dṛśyo doṣo hareḥ kvacit /
GSP33nysu__3u:11328: ataḥ svenaiva svayaṃ svaprāmāṇyaṃ ca siddhayati kā tatra parīkṣāpekṣeti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11332: jñānaṃ tatprāmāṇyaṃ ca sākṣiṇaiva jñāyata iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11333: yadi ca svataḥprāmāṇyagraho na syāttarhi na syādeva /
GSP33nysu__3u:11336: tatprāmāṇyāvadhāraṇaṃ ca parīkṣāntareṇeti kathaṃ nānavasthā syāditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:11350: saṃśayaśca manovṛttiviṣaye pānīyādau bhavati na punaḥ sākṣisiddhe sukhādau /
GSP33nysu__3u:11351: atastāvadeva parīkṣā yāvatsākṣigṛhīteṣu sukhādiṣvavatāra iti kuto 'navastheti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11353: manovṛttiviṣaya eva saṃśayo na sākṣisiddha ityatra kiṃ kāraṇamityata āha- mānasa iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11354: mānase darśane doṣāḥ syurnavai sākṣidarśane // MAnuv_3,4.142cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11368: atastatsaṃśayātmakaṃ vā jāyate niścayatayā jātasya viṣaye vā āhāyarḥ saṃśayo bhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:11374: sākṣidarśane na sambhavantītyetatkuta ityata āha- sudṛḍha iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11375: sudṛḍho nirṇayo yatra jñeyaṃ tat sākṣidarśanam // MAnuv_3,4.142ef //
GSP33nysu__3u:11384: sākṣidarśanaṃ ca nirṇayātmakameva bhavati na ca bādhyata ityupapāditaṃ pṛthagadhikaraṇe /
GSP33nysu__3u:11386: sākṣisiddhe 'rthe saṃśayo nāstītyuktaṃ tadanubhavārūḍhaṃ kartuṃ sākṣisiddhamarthaṃ tāvadāha- iccheti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11392: ... na kaściddhi tatra saṃśayavān kvacit // MAnuv_3,4.143cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11395: na jātu mama sukhamasti na veti saṃśayo nāpi pratīyamānamidaṃ sukhaṃ sadasadveti saṃśaya iti hiśabdenāha /
GSP33nysu__3u:11397: nahi pratītisamayamātravartini tatrānyajñānaṃ sambhavatītyata āha- yadīti // *11,210*
GSP33nysu__3u:11398: yat kvacid vyabhicārī syād darśanaṃ mānasaṃ hi tat // MAnuv_3,4.143ef //
GSP33nysu__3u:11400: yaddarśanaṃ kvacicchuktirajatādau viṣaye vyabhicāri bādhitaṃ syāttaccakṣurādikaraṇakaṃ manaḥpariṇatirūpameva na sākṣirūpam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11407: kīdṛśasya tarhi prāmāṇyamityata āha- mana iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11409: prāmāṇyaṃ sugṛhītaṃ syāt tat parīkṣitadarśanam // MAnuv_3,4.144 //
GSP33nysu__3u:11417: yatra jñāne sugṛhītaṃ parīkṣayā niścitaṃ tatparīkṣitadarśanaṃ pramāṇamiti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11419: dharmijñānānumānopamānānuvyavasāyānāṃ tu prāmāṇyagrahaṇaṃ na parīkṣāpekṣamiti kecinmanyante /
GSP33nysu__3u:11423: evaṃ mānasapratyakṣādijñānaprāmāṇyagrahasya parīkṣādhīnatve 'pi sākṣiprāmāṇyagrahasya tadanapekṣatvānna parīkṣānavasthetyuktam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11425: sākṣivatpratyakṣādijñānasyāpi prāmāṇyagrahaḥ parīkṣānapekṣa evoktavidhayā svataḥ kinna syādityāśaṅkāṃ pariharati- neti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11426: na jñānadṛṣṭimātreṇa prāmāṇyaṃ tasya dṛśyate // MAnuv_3,4.145ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:11436: bhavatu vā jñānaṃ svaprakāśaṃ tathāpi svarūpamātra eva na tu svadharme prāmāṇye 'pi /
GSP33nysu__3u:11438: vedavākyaśravaṇe sati bāhyasya vākyārthajñānamutpadyate na vā /
GSP33nysu__3u:11448: tato jñānadṛṣṭimātreṇa na jñānaprāmāṇyaṃ dṛśyata iti dvitīya evāṅgīkāryaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11449: tathāca svaprakāśajñānenaiva prāmāṇyagraha iti kathaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:11450: apauruṣeyatvādiyuktibhiḥ prabodhito bāhyaḥ pratipadyate ca tatprāmāṇyamiti kathaṃ na parīkṣāpekṣatvam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11451: anyathā vaidikajñānaprāmāṇye vipratipattireva na syāt jñānasvarūpavat /
GSP33nysu__3u:11453: idamanubhavasya rajatasmaraṇasya ca bhedāgraho hi vibhramaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11463: anumeyatve 'pi jñānasya na jñānānumitimātreṇa prāmāṇyaṃ tasya dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:11467: tato jñātatādimātreṇa pratīte jñāne bādhābhāvādinā prāmāṇyamanumeyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11491: yadi vṛttijñānānāmiva sākṣijñānasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃ taddarśanamātreṇa na dṛśyate tadādhikamapi kāraṇaṃ kalpayāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11498: svaprāmāṇyaṃ sadā sākṣī paśyatyeva suniścayāt // MAnuv_3,4.146ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:11507: tathāca na vilakṣaṇatvāditi yatsvataḥ prāmāṇyamiṣyaṃ tattyaktaṃ syādityata āha- jñānasyeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11510: jñānasya grāhakeṇa sākṣiṇaiva jñānasya mānatāyā miteḥ kāraṇātsvataḥprāmāṇyamiṣyata eveti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11511: bhavetsvataḥprāmāṇyatyāgo yadi jñānameva sākṣivedyaṃ na prāmāṇyamiti brūmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11514: kimarthaṃ tarhi parīkṣāvaśyambhāvo 'bhyupagamyata ityata āha- doṣeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11519: jñānaṃ gṛhṇansākṣī karaṇadoṣābhāve 'sya prāmāṇyamityeva prāmāṇyaṃ niścinoti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11531: syādetadyadīyaṃ prakriyā pramāṇavatī syānna ca tadastītyata āha- ata iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11532: ato na sarvamānānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ niścitaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__3u:11533: sākṣiṇā niścitaṃ yatra tat prāmāṇyasvalakṣaṇam // MAnuv_3,4.148 // *11,223*
GSP33nysu__3u:11535: ata eva hi sarveṣāṃ jñānānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ prathamato na niścitaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__3u:11536: kinnāma yatra yadā parīkṣāsahakṛtena sākṣiṇā prāmāṇyaṃ niścitaṃ bhavati tattadaiva prāmāṇyaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyasvarūpamaprāmāṇyaviviktaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ siddhayati /
GSP33nysu__3u:11538: yadi sākṣī doṣābhāve pramāṇametaditi prathamaṃ sammugdhaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ gṛhītvā paścājjijñāsāyāṃ
GSP33nysu__3u:11539: satyāṃ parīkṣayā pramāṇamevetyavadhārayatītyeṣā prakriyā nāṅgīkriyeta tadānabhyastaviṣayāṇāṃ
GSP33nysu__3u:11540: śabdādinā jātānāṃ sarveṣāmapi jñānānāṃ prathamameva prāmāṇyamavadhāryeta /
GSP33nysu__3u:11544: na hi kaścit sukhādyeṣu saṃśayaṃ kurute janaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11548: yasmātsukhādyeṣu kaścitsaṃśayaṃ na karoti yasmāccākhilāni vṛttijñānāni darśana eva pramāṇatayākhilo jano na niścinoti tasmātsākṣiprāmāṇyaṃ parīkṣānapekṣeṇa sākṣiṇaiva gṛhyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:11553: doṣābhāvādikaṃ caiva sākṣī samyak prapaśyati // MAnuv_3,4.150cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11556: svasya parīkṣāyāśca doṣābhāvaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ ca parīkṣānirapekṣaḥ sākṣyeva samyak prapaśyati /
GSP33nysu__3u:11560: tat parīkṣitamānena na doṣo viṣṇavi kvacit // MAnuv_3,4.151ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:11563: tena ca bhagavati kvacidapi doṣo nāstīti siddham /
GSP33nysu__3u:11565: evamaparīkṣitaṃ doṣadarśanaṃ parīkṣitena nirdeṣatādarśanena bādhitaṃ na bhagavato doṣitvaṃ sādhayituṃ śaktamityuktam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11579: yatra yadākṣajamāgamasyopajīvyaṃ tat tadā pratyakṣaviruddhārthe jātyā prabalasyāpyāgamasya mānatā nāsti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11587: laukike pratyakṣasiddhajīvādiviṣaye brahmātmakatvādibodhanarūpe vyavahāre tattvamasyādyāgamena kriyamāṇe atra āgame āgamaṃ prati pratyakṣasyopajīvyatā
GSP33nysu__3u:11588: avatārāṇāṃ viśvādīnāṃ ca doṣadṛṣṭau pratyakṣādikaṃ pratyāgamasyopajīvyatā syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:11594: anena doṣaviṣayapratyakṣavirodhādāgamasyaivāprāmāṇyaṃ kinna syāditi codyaṃ garbhasrāveṇaiva gatam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11597: āgamena hi viṣṇutvaṃ jñātvā doṣo 'tra kalpyate // MAnuv_3,4.154ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:11600: vastutaḥ kalpanaivaiṣā na pramitiritibhāvena kalpyata ityuktam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11603: tadeva na jñātavyamityata āha- na cediti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11606: yadi viṣṇutvaṃ rāmakṛṣṇādau na jñātaṃ tadā doṣagrāhiṇā pratyakṣeṇa viṣṇoranyo doṣavāniti gṛhītaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:11608: nahi devadatte devadattatvājñāne devadatto 'yamāgata ityākāraṃ jñānamutpattumarhatīti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11610: yataḥ śrīvatsakaustubhādilakṣaṇena viṣṇutvamanumāya viṣṇurdeṣavāniti pratyakṣeṇa jñāsyata ityata āha- śāstreti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11616: nanu viṣṇutvājñāne viṣṇoranyo doṣavāniti jñānena kuto bhāvyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11624: nanu yathā paṭo 'yaṃ chinno dagdho malina iti parānupajīvinā pratyakṣeṇaiva gṛhyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:11625: tathā'gamādikamanupajīvya pratyakṣeṇaiva viṣṇurdeṣavāniti jñāsyata ityata āha- neti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11626: na viṣṇordeṣavattve hi pratyakṣaṃ vartate svataḥ // MAnuv_3,4.155cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11633: yathā pañcapalaparimito 'yaṃ paṭo malina iti jñānamiti / *11,228*
GSP33nysu__3u:11636: viṣṇurayaṃ doṣavāniti vā viṣṇoranyo 'yaṃ doṣavāniti vā kaścidayaṃ doṣavāniti vā /
GSP33nysu__3u:11651: sa ca sarvarūpopetasya viṣṇornirdeṣatvaṃ pratipādayatīti tadvirodhādapramāṇameva doṣaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣamiti / *11,229*
GSP33nysu__3u:11658: kecittatkālavartinaḥ puruṣā bhagavadrūpeṣu doṣānpaśyantītyatrārthe 'smākaṃ kiṃ pramāṇam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11673: tatpurāṇavākyaṃ taddoṣadarśanaṃ kiṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ pramāṇatayā manyate,
GSP33nysu__3u:11679: bhagavadrūpeṣu doṣagrāhiṇīṃ pratītiṃ pramāṇatayā pratipādayatpurāṇavākyaṃ doṣasadbhāvaṃ manyata eva /
GSP33nysu__3u:11680: na hi sambhavati tadgrāhiṇaḥ prāmāṇyamaṅgīkaroti nāṅgīkaroti ca taditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:11681: doṣasadbhāvaṃ manyamānaṃ ca tatprāgudāhṛtayā śrutyaiva viruddhayata iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11682: purāṇavākyasya śrutiviruddhatve ko doṣa ityata āha- purāṇasyeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11686: yataḥ kenacitkāraṇena kañcidarthaṃ buddhisthīkṛtya vākyaṃ prayuñjmahe /
GSP33nysu__3u:11688: purāṇavākyasya ca veda eva mūlaṃ kuta ityata āha- naceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11701: ataḥ pariśeṣādveda eva purāṇasyopajīvya iti siddham /
GSP33nysu__3u:11703: tadvirodhe kathaṃ mānaṃ tat tatra ca bhaviṣyati // MAnuv_3,4.157cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11709: nanvīśvarapraṇītānāṃ purāṇānāṃ tadīyaṃ nijaṃ jñānameva mūlaṃ na vedaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11717: tathāpi veda eva purāṇasyopajīvya iti katham /
GSP33nysu__3u:11728: akṣajaṃ kathameva bhavediti pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇatayābhilaṣitārthe nodbhāvayituṃ śakyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:11731: yadyevaṃ devadattādibhramaḥ kiṃ nākṣajaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_3,4.158cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11743: dṛśyate hyupajīvyasyāpīdaṃ rajatamiti jñānasyopajīvakena nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānena bādha iti cet /
GSP33nysu__3u:11746: pratiṣedhātmakaṃ tu nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānamupajīvakamiti vā,
GSP33nysu__3u:11756: upajīvye 'śodhite parīkṣayāpramāṇādavivikte upajīvakena bādhite na doṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11764: (astveva) astyevedaṃ rajataṃ nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānayorupajīvyopajīvakabhāva upajīvyasyopajīvakena bādhaśca /
GSP33nysu__3u:11767: parīkṣayā śodhitamupajīvyaṃ virodhyupajīvakaṃ bādhate svayaṃ tena na bādhyata iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11773: idaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ tu na śodhitam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11789: ātyantikaparīkṣaiva bādhakatvopayoginī bhavatu kimupajīvyatvenetyapi na vācyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11798: yadyapyekamevedaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ tathāpi viṣayopādhivaśād vibhāgam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11802: sarvaṃ jñānaṃ dharmiṇi pramāṇaṃ prakāre tu viparyaya iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11812: asminpakṣe yadupajīvyaṃ na tadupajīvakena bādhyate yacca bādhyate na tadupajīvyamityato nedamasmadīyaniyamabhaṅgasyodāharaṇamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11818: yaḥ sarvajña ityādīnāṃ tattvamasyādīnāṃ ca kathamupajīvyopajīvakabhāva iti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11821: naca prāptiṃ vinā pratiṣedho 'stīti prāptirūpaṃ yaḥ sarvajña ityādikamupajīvyam,
GSP33nysu__3u:11827: yadbādhyate sārvajñādikaṃ na tadupajīvyamiti na kaścidvirodha iti / *11,242*
GSP33nysu__3u:11833: tatkathamityataḥ prathamapakṣe tāvadvaiṣamyaṃ darśayati- suparīkṣita iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11836: prathamapramāṇe suparīkṣite sati na caivamiti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11838: idaṃ rajatamiti jñānamupajīvyamapyaparīkṣitatvādupajīvakena nedaṃ rajatamati jñānena bādhyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:11842: yaḥ sarvajña ityādīnāmahaṃ duḥkhītyādīnāṃ ca suparīkṣitatvāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:11843: upapāditaṃ khalu yaḥ sarvajña ityādiśrutīnāṃ tattvāvedakatvaṃ sākṣiṇaśca niyamenāvyabhicāritvamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11845: sarvaṃ tadupajīvyaiva pramāṇaṃ vartate yataḥ // MAnuv_3,4.160ef //
GSP33nysu__3u:11847: yataḥ kāraṇāttatsarvaṃ sārvajñādikamupajīvyaiva tattvamasītyādikaṃ pramāṇaṃ pravartate 'to na caivamiti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11849: yathā nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ purovartinaḥ svarūpamātraṃ dharmīkṛtya pravartate na tu rajatatvaviśiṣyaṃ na tathā tattvamasyādivākyaṃ pravartitumarhati
GSP33nysu__3u:11850: kintu sarvajñatvādiviśiṣyaṃ brahmasvarūpaṃ duḥkhādiviśiṣyaṃ jīvasvarūpaṃ ca dharmīkṛtyaiva /
GSP33nysu__3u:11853: nanu tattvamasyādivākyamapi yadi svarūpamātramupajīvya pravarteta tadā kīdṛśo doṣa ityata āha- kathamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11855: vihāya yasmātkasmāccit svarūpasyaiva ced yadi // MAnuv_3,4.161 //
GSP33nysu__3u:11860: dharmānvihāya svarūpasyaivopajīvyatvaṃ cettarhi tatkathaṃ jñeyaṃ yattattvamasīti bodhyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:11867: tathāca na kaściddoṣa ityataḥ śiṣyaṃ vākyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11868: yadi tattvādidharmopetasyopajīvyatvaṃ tarhi sarvajñatvādikaṃ vihāya yasmātkasmāccittattvādestadbrahmeti kathaṃ jñeyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11879: nanu nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ yathā svarūpamātramupajīvya pravṛttam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11880: tathedamapi pravartsyati ko doṣa ityata āha- svarūpasyaiveti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11892: sarvalakṣaṇayuktaṃ tu svarūpaṃ yadi bhaṇyate // MAnuv_3,4.163ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:11895: bhaṇyate tacchabdena iti yadi bhaṇyate ityāvṛttyā yojyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11900: prativādyuktārthāṅgīkāre pratijñāhāniḥ kathaṃ na bhavedityata āha- na iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11926: akhilaṃ yogyānvitaṃ svarūpaṃ viśeṣasāmānyatayā śabdabodhyaṃ bhavet / *11,252*
GSP33nysu__3u:11928: taccaikasya padasya sāmānyata eva na viśeṣata iti na buddhau brahmārohaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11929: yadi ca viśeṣastadā dharmigrāhivirodhastadavastha eveti samudāyārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11933: naca tatrāpi vyāvṛttasyaivopajīvyatvaṃ na svarūpamātrasyetyuktamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11940: vyāvartayanti tadrūpaṃ caitramātrad vinaiva hi // MAnuv_3,4.165 //
GSP33nysu__3u:11954: brahmaṇo nirviśeṣatvād vyāvartayati kiṃ punaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.166ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:11957: kiṃ kartṛ, brahma vyāvartayati, na kimapi /
GSP33nysu__3u:11963: tadedaṃ vākyaṃ siddhasādhanaṃ jñātasyaiva jñāpakaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:11967: vijñānamānandaṃ brahmetyādiśrutyā brahmalakṣaṇatvenoktena cinmātratvādinā tu bhaviṣyatītyata āha- cinmātratvaṃ ceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11973: cinmātratvādikaṃ na brahmaṇo bhinnam ato nirviśeṣatvāvirodhāttadaṅgīkriyata ityata āha- tāvanmātramiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11974: tāvanmātraṃ yadīṣyaṃ syāt sarvajñatvaṃ kuto na tat // MAnuv_3,4.167cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11983: yathā nedaṃ rajatamiti jñāne 'viruddhapurovartitvādyupetasya dharmitvaṃ na viruddharajatatvādyupetasyetyata āha- cinmātreti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11986: cinmātreṇābhedaścinmātrābhedaḥ saḥ sādhyaḥ pratipādyo yasya tattathoktam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11991: taccidaikyaṃ prativādino bodhyasya yata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11997: svābhedāṅgīkṛtau cidabhedaḥ kathaṃ siddha ityata āha- cittvamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12002: virodhabhayātsarvajñatvādiviśiṣyaṃ na dharmīkriyate iti vadatā cidānandarūpamapi na dharmīkartavyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12005: cinmātraṃ tvadatiriktaṃ nāstīti vākyārtha iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__3u:12009: na virodhabhayādvayaṃ sārvajñādikaṃ dharmiṇi na niveśayāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12028: yatparasāpekṣaṃ tanna sadityaṅgīkāre brahmaṇaścetanatvaṃ ca na syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12043: jñasya brahmaṇo jñeyaṃ svayameva vā syātparaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__3u:12045: svajñeyatvaṃ ca naivāsau manyate saviśeṣataḥ // MAnuv_3,4.170ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:12049: kuto na manyata ityata āha- saviśeṣata iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12051: pratyak parāgbhāvalakṣaṇo hi kartṛkarmabhāvo naikatraikasya yujyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:12052: yadi ca syāttadā bhedapratinidhinā viśeṣeṇa ghaṭanīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12054: nivirśeṣaṃ ca brahmāṅgīkṛtamiti svajñeyatvaṃ na manyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:12056: tacca mithyābhūtamiti kathaṃ tadapekṣaṃ cetanatvaṃ satsyāditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:12058: kiñcaivaṃ vadatā svarūpamātramupajīvyamityapi vaktuṃ na śakyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:12071: svaṃ ca tadrūpaṃ ceti hi svarūpam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12073: tena svasminprāpte 'pyucyamānaḥ svaśabdaḥ parisaṅkhayānyāyena paravyāvṛttimeva pratipādayatīti jñāyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:12076: ... svarūpaṃ nāma kiṃ na cet // MAnuv_3,4.170 //
GSP33nysu__3u:12077: na svarūpābhidhāyi syād vaiyarthyaṃ svaravasya yat /
GSP33nysu__3u:12080: asmadabhipretaṃ vyākhyānaṃ na cedaṅgīkriyate tadā svarūpaṃ nāma kiṃ, na kimapi /
GSP33nysu__3u:12082: rūpaśabdasamānārthaḥ svarūpaśabda ityataḥ kathametaditi cedatra vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12086: yasmādasminpakṣe svaśabdasya vaiyarthyaṃ tasmātsvarūpaṃ nāma kimita sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12089: nahi rūpaśabdo rūpaśabdārthaṃ nābhidhava iti sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:12097: pratītipramāṇaka eva śabdārthaniścaya iti hi śābdāḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12103: yaduktaṃ cetanatvaṃ brahmaṇo na syāditi tadiṣyāpādanam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12107: tadarthā eva cetanatvavādā vyākhyātavyā ityataścaitanyamapi na pareṇa śakyāṅgīkāramiti bhāvena tadvayākhyāti- cetanasyeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12108: cetanasya svabhāvo hi caitanyamiti gīyate // MAnuv_3,4.172ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:12112: iti hi gīyata ityanena guṇavacanabrāhmaṇādibhyaḥ karmaṇi ceti smṛtiṃ sūcayati /
GSP33nysu__3u:12127: parantu mithyeti tatsāpekṣaṃ jñānaṃ kathaṃ satsyāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:12128: brahmaṇo jñānatve jñeyādyupetatā kuta iti cet /
GSP33nysu__3u:12134: na jñeyajñātṛhīnaṃ hi jñānaṃ nāma kvacid bhavet // MAnuv_3,4.173ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:12139: jñeyajñānavihīnaśca jña ityatra ca na pramā // MAnuv_3,4.173cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:12143: nanu prasiddhasya jñānasya jñeyādyupetatve 'pīdaṃ brahmasvarūpaṃ jñānaṃ tadrahitaṃ bhavatu kiṃ bādhakamityata āha- jñātṛjñeyeti // *11,269*
GSP33nysu__3u:12145: hīnaṃ bhojanameva syāt tāḍanaṃ kartṛtāḍyataḥ // MAnuv_3,4.174 //
GSP33nysu__3u:12148: kartṛ tāḍyata iti tāḍayitṛtāḍyābhyāṃ hīnaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12150: ākāṅkṣāvaśātsakarmakatayā pratīyamānamapi ca yadi niṣkarmakaṃ syāttadokto bahutaro 'tiprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP33nysu__3u:12153: nahi sakarmakakriyāyāḥ kartā kriyādirahito yukta iti / *11,270*
GSP33nysu__3u:12157: akāryaṃ ca brahmākhyaṃ jñānamiti na tasya kartrādyapekṣetyāśayavān śaṅkate- nityatvāditi //
GSP33nysu__3u:12158: nityatvāt tādṛśaṃ ca syāditi cen ... // MAnuv_3,4.175ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:12161: anityasya bhojanāderbhoktrādyapekṣāyāmapīdaṃ nityatvāttādṛśaṃ jñātrādirahitaṃ ca syādityanena vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhyā vyāpyaviparyayaḥ śaṅkitaḥ
GSP33nysu__3u:12168: ata eva kaściddhātvarthaḥ karmādyanvitaḥ kaścinneti yujyata ityāśayavānākāṅkṣāmaprayojakīkṛtya kāryatvādyeva prayojakīkurvāṇasyātiprasaṅgamāha- nityeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12179: kathaṃ na sā tādṛśītyata āha- draṣṭāra iti // *11,271*
GSP33nysu__3u:12180: draṣṭāro vedavāco hi santi vācyāni cāñjasā // MAnuv_3,4.176ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:12184: nanu santi sthitisamaye vedavāco vasiṣṭhādayo draṣṭāra indrādayaśca vācyāḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12185: natu mahāpralaya ityata āha- nitya iti // *11,273*
GSP33nysu__3u:12186: nityo draṣṭā ca vācyaśca bhagavāneva ca svayam // MAnuv_3,4.176cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:12187: na hi vaktṛvihīnā ca vācyahīnāpi vāk kvacit // MAnuv_3,4.177ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:12195: rūpaṃ jñānaṃ vyavahāre jñeyādyanvitamapi paramārthatastadrahitaṃ bhaviṣyatīti pratyāśāṃ vārayitumidaṃ vacanam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12198: jñātṛjñeyavihīnaṃ ca jñānamevaṃ na tad bhavet // MAnuv_3,4.177cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:12204: ākāṅkṣānimittaṃ pratisambandhyanvitatvaṃ nityatvena na hīyata ityetāvanmātre(ṇa)
GSP33nysu__3u:12213: yasmāttasmādevaṃ nityo 'pi jño jñānajñeyavihīno naiva vidyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:12214: śaktiḥ kārakamiti pakṣasya sthitvānnityo vakteti yujyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:12218: kiñca sarvavilopaśca kena mānena gamyate // MAnuv_3,4.179ab // *11,284*
GSP33nysu__3u:12227: nanu neha nānāsti kiñcanetyāgamasya sadbhāvātkathaṃ viśvamithyātve mānābhāva iti cedatra pṛcchāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12228: atra sarvasya mithyātvaṃ pratipādayati vākye sarvāntargatatvenedaṃ vākyametadvākyārthaśca gṛhyate na veti /
GSP33nysu__3u:12230: sarveṇa saha tad vākyāmarthaśca yadi gṛhyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:12231: tadabhāvena sarvasya nāpalāpo bhavet tadā // MAnuv_3,4.179c-f //
GSP33nysu__3u:12236: na gṛhyate ced tannyāyādapalāpo na hi kvacit // MAnuv_3,4.180ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:12246: nanu vākyodāharaṇe kṛte naivaṃvidhaṃ vākyamastīti vā (e)
GSP33nysu__3u:12248: stīti vā nāsya vākyasyātra tātparyamastīti vā vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12249: anena vikalpanirākaraṇena tu kiṃ kṛtaṃ syādityata āha- upapattīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12259: atra cāstyupapattivirodha iti jñāpanāya vikalpya dūṣaṇābhidhānaṃ kṛtamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:12262: tatropapattivirodhe 'pyanyairliṅgairasya vākyasya prapañcamithyātve tātparyamavagamyatāmityata āha- upakramādīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12266: upakramādiliṅgānāṃ madhye yadyaduttaraṃ tattadbalīya ityupapattireva balīyasī /
GSP33nysu__3u:12267: śrutyādau liṅgasamūhe ca yadyatpūrvaṃ tattadbalīya iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:12269: tato balavadvirodhe satāmanyeṣāṃ liṅgānāṃ na tātparyaniścāyakatvaṃ yuktam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12276: itaśca nāpyasya vākyasya prapañcamithyātve tātparyamāha- pratyakṣamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12302: tarhi niravakāśaṃ vākyamapramāṇaṃ prasajyata ityata āha- upapanna iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12305: pratyakṣādipramāṇopakramādiliṅgāvirodhini tadānukūlyopapanne ca bhagavati svagatabhedābhāve 'rthe vākyasya sati sa evārthaḥ kathaṃ grāhyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12306: neha nāneti vākyasyāpavyākhyāne nirākṛte labdhamāha- mukhyārtha iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12307: mukhyārthe vidyamāne tu kva sāvarjñyaṃ niṣiddhayate // MAnuv_3,4.183cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:12310: tasminnavidyamāne tu sāvarjñaṃ na pratiṣeddhuṃ śakyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:12314: ata eva mukhyārthe vākyasya vidyamāne sati /
GSP33nysu__3u:12315: anena prapañcamithyātvāsiddheḥ kva sārvajñaṃ niṣidhyata iti yojanā /
GSP33nysu__3u:12325: yathā yaḥ puruṣaḥ sa sthāṇurityatrāropitena puruṣatvena vyāvṛttaṃ vastu dharmīkṛtya pravṛttāvapi nopajīvyavirodha ityata āha- apalāpo 'pīti
GSP33nysu__3u:12326: apalāpo 'pi sarvasya na kathañcana yujyate // MAnuv_3,4.184cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:12333: nanu ca tattvamasyādivākyameva jīvabrahmaṇorekatāṃ pratipādayatsārvajñādiguṇajātasya mithyātvaṃ gamayati /
GSP33nysu__3u:12335: tatkathaṃ guṇānāṃ mithyātve pramāṇābhāva iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__3u:12339: anādiyogyatā coktā tena grāhyaiva sarvathā // MAnuv_3,4.185ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:12344: yadā devamānavadānavarūpā tadavāntarabhedarūpā ca jīvānāṃ yogyatānādinityā pramitā tadā kā vārtā jīvabrahmaṇorekatvasya /
GSP33nysu__3u:12345: tathā ca kathaṃ tatsiddhaye guṇānāṃ mithyātvakalpanamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:12347: muktānāṃ tāratamyaṃ ca mānairuktairna cālyate // MAnuv_3,4.185cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:12356: jñānino 'pi yato nityaṃ kurvanti śubhameva hi /
GSP33nysu__3u:12357: tāratamyaṃ tu muktau ca tenaivādhyavasīyate // MAnuv_3,4.186 //
GSP33nysu__3u:12365: idānīṃ tu jñānena niścitamokṣāṇāmapi śubhāśubhakaraṇaparityāgatāratamyāducyata iti bhedaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12367: tāratamyaṃ na cenmuktau kutaḥ kuryuḥ śubhaṃ punaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.187ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:12370: yadi brahmādyā muktau tāratamyavanto na syustadā jñānamātreṇa mokṣasya prāptaprāyatvājjñānottarakālaṃ śubhaṃ na kuryuḥ /

GSP33nysu__3u:12985: tadanyathā sāmyena vaiparītyena ca karaṇe 'nartho bhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:12990: tatprītyanusāreṇa tasya yasminyathā prītistadanusāreṇa bhaktikaraṇe sati tasminbhakte tasya rājādeḥ prītiraddhā niyamenaiva dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:12997: etenaiva bhagavadbhakteṣu ramābrahmādiṣu tāratamyenaiva muktiḥ karaṇīyeti samarthitenaiva devatātāratamyaparijñānaṃ yatprāguktaṃ tadapi mokṣasya sādhanamiti siddham /
GSP33nysu__3u:12998: na hyavidite tāratamye tāratamyānurodhena muktikaraṇaṃ sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:13003: teṣu bhaktiḥ krameṇaiva kāryā nityaṃ mumukṣubhiḥ // MAnuv_3,4.229ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:13009: sarve 'pi guravaścaite puruṣasya sadaiva hi // MAnuv_3,4.229cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:13010: tasmāt pūjyāśca namyāśca dhyeyāśca parito harim /
GSP33nysu__3u:13019: pūjyāścetyādinā bhaktereva prapañcanaṃ hariṃ parito na tu pṛthak /
GSP33nysu__3u:13020: vedānusārata iti yaduktaṃ tadapyanena daśirtaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:13021: krameṇaiva tayīyeṣu bhaktistatsmṛtirityādau tacchabdena tadīyā ucyante /
GSP33nysu__3u:13023: krameṇeti hariviṣayāṇi bhaktyādīni mukhyasādhanāni tadīyaviṣayāṇi tvamukhyasādhanānītyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13027: pravṛtte pañcarātre hi sādhanasya vinirṇayaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.233cd // *11,345*
GSP33nysu__3u:13035: bhaktiryato yathā svasminnityādyā yuktiratra ca // MAnuv_3,4.234 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13038: vaiṣṇavairdaityādiṣu kriyamāṇe dveṣe vyabhicāraṃ vārayituṃ sadityuktam /
GSP33nysu__3u:13041: atra tu śubhamātrasādhanatvābhāve viśeṣavyāptimevāśritya saddveṣatvamiti mahānbhedaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13051: iha kramāditi pratijñāyāṃ viśeṣaṇaprakṣepeṇa bhagavadbhaktabhakteḥ kartavyatvaṃ tattāratamyasya cāvaśyakatvaṃ siddhayati /
GSP33nysu__3u:13061: prītidaiva hareryasmād bhaktiḥ sā svopagā yathā // MAnuv_3,4.235 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13076: tadetajjñānakarmādiphalaṃ kiṃ prerakatvāddevānāṃ bhavati uta kartṛtvāddevadattasyeti saṃśaye prathamasūtreṇa devānāmeveti pūrvapakṣayitvā /
GSP33nysu__3u:13078: ityekadeśimatena siddhāntamabhidhāya“sahakāryantaravidhiḥ pakṣeṇa tṛtīyaṃ tadvato vidhyādivat';
GSP33nysu__3u:13080: tatra devānāṃ jñānādiphalamiti pūrvapakṣāṃśo grāhya eva /
GSP33nysu__3u:13088: devadattenānuṣṭhitasya jñānādeḥ phalaṃ devānāṃ bhavatītyekā pratijñā /
GSP33nysu__3u:13089: bhavacca tatkrameṇaiva na tu sāmyena vaiparītyena veti dvitīyā /
GSP33nysu__3u:13091: svātantryatāratamyena phalaṃ hi phalināṃ bhavet // MAnuv_3,4.236cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:13097: anena prathamapratijñāyāṃ svātantryahetuḥ sūcito bhavati yaḥ sūtre svāmipadenoktaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13099: tathāpi phalaprāptāvuktasya svāmitvahetoḥ sāmarthyena prāptamiti tadapyupapāditam /
GSP33nysu__3u:13100: yadi svātantryāddevadattānuṣṭhitajñānādiphalaṃ devānāṃ syāttarhi tadanuṣṭhitamithyājñānādiphalamapi prasajyetāviśeṣādityata āha- aśubhaṃ tviti
GSP33nysu__3u:13102: ājñayā cānyagaṃ naiva bhogāya bhavati kvacit // MAnuv_3,4.237 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13104: anyagamaśubhaṃ tveṣāṃ devānāṃ kvacidapi bhogāya na bhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:13106: hareḥ prītito 'śubhe 'pyeṣāṃ svātantryādbhagavatprasādena maitadasmānprāpaditi nivāraṇe teṣāṃ sāmarthyasadbhāvāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:13108: anyagamiti vadatā svagataṃ tu bhavatīti sūcitam /
GSP33nysu__3u:13115: anena“puṇyamevāmuṃ gacchati na ha vai devānpāpaṃ gacchati';
GSP33nysu__3u:13117: amuṃ saptānnavidyopāsanena prerakatayā parapurapraveśinaṃ parakṛtaṃ puṇyamevāpnoti na pāpam /
GSP33nysu__3u:13127: kāstā yuktaya ityatastā darśayitumāgamavākyaṃ paṭhati- upasaneti //
GSP33nysu__3u:13130: prerayanti hi te jīvān puṇyapāpeṣu nityaśaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13133: haripūjeti coddeśāt kathaṃ na śubhamāpnuyuḥ // MAnuv_3,4.241 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13143: kiñca te devā vāsudevājñayaiva na tu svecchayā tattatkṛtapūrvakarmānusārata eva /
GSP33nysu__3u:13144: ata evārāgadveṣato rāgadveṣau vinaiva nityaśo jīvānpuṇyapāpeṣu prerayanti hi yasmāttasmātkathaṃ doṣānavāpnuyuḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13146: pāpādipreraṇena devānāmaśubhaṃ na bhavatītyeva kevalaṃ na,
GSP33nysu__3u:13148: kiñca svavihitaparapreraṇe haripūjeyamiti coddeśātkathaṃ devā na śubhamāpanuyuḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13157: devā eva hi devānāṃ viśiṣṭā viniyāmakāḥ // MAnuv_3,4.243ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:13168: tatrāpi tāratamye ko heturityata uktam- dravyeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:13170: devānāmanyagaṃ cāpi teṣu yad brahmaṇo 'dhikam // MAnuv_3,4.244 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13173: dravyāṇīndriyādīni teṣu svātantryaṃ dravyasvātantryaṃ vijñānaprayatnau dharmādyutpānanimitte /
GSP33nysu__3u:13185: yasya cā'vāpādau jñānaprayatnādhikyaṃ tasya phalādhikyaṃ dṛśyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13199: krameṇaiva yathāśakti yathā ye ye prayojakāḥ // MAnuv_3,4.247 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13200: prerakā api pāpānāṃ na devāḥ pāpamāpnuyuḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13201: iti prakāśikāyāṃ hi provāca harirañjasā // MAnuv_3,4.248 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13205: tasya vivaraṇaṃ ye ye yathā prayojakāstathā tatheti /
GSP33nysu__3u:13208: oṃ sahakāryantaravidhiḥ pakṣeṇa tṛtīyaṃ tadvato vidhyādivat oṃ //
GSP33nysu__3u:13210: ārtvijyam ity auḍulomiḥ tasmai hi parikrīyate / BBs_3,4.45 /
GSP33nysu__3u:13211: sahakāryantaravidhiḥ pakṣeṇa tṛtīyaṃ tadvato vidhyādivat / BBs_3,4.47 /
GSP33nysu__3u:13212: yadyapyevaṃ surāṇāṃ ca daityānāṃ ca mahat phalam /
GSP33nysu__3u:13213: śubhāśubhebhya evañca kartuśca syād yathoditam // MAnuv_3,4.249 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13215: evamuktaprakāreṇa yadyapi śubhāśubhebhyo jñānādibhyo bhavatphalaṃ surāṇāṃ ca daityānāṃ ca bhavatītyupapāditam /
GSP33nysu__3u:13222: kartuḥ phalāṅgīkāre yadu kiñcemāḥ prajā iti sāvadhāraṇaśrutivirodha ātreyavacanavirodhaśca syādityata uktam- mahaditi //
GSP33nysu__3u:13225: kutaḥ kartuḥ phalāṅgīkāra ityata āha- yathoditamita //
GSP33nysu__3u:13232: kartuḥ śubhāśubhaphalasadbhāvādeva mānuṣottamamārabhya devaparyantā daityaparyantāśca nirayādyupabhogina iti yujyate nānyathetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13236: iti tattvavivekoktaṃ svayaṃ bhagavatā vacaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.251 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13259: jñānadānaṃ kimāviṣkāreṇa kāryamutānāviṣkāreṇeti saṃśaye pūrvavadatrāpi pūrvapakṣamatyantaheyatvābhāvātprapañcenāṃha- jñānadā apīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:13263: na kevalaṃ śiṣyāḥ kintu jñānadā ācāryā api jñānaphalamāpnuyuḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13265: ācāryā ityenenaiva siddhe jñānadā iti vacanaṃ jñānadāneneti jñāpanārtham /
GSP33nysu__3u:13270: devāḥ sahasraguṇitaṃ kramāt tasmād yathottaram // MAnuv_3,4.253 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13277: tataḥ paramagurorapare guravaḥ svaśiṣyaphalāpekṣayā sārdhaṃ tāvat adhyardhaṃ phalamāpanuvanti /
GSP33nysu__3u:13297: bhaktiṃ mayi parāṃ kṛtvā māmevaiṣyatyasaṃśayaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.255 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13299: bhavitā na ca me tasmādanyaḥ priyataro bhuvi /
GSP33nysu__3u:13303: yata evaṃ jñānadānaṃ tatsampradāyapravartanaṃ ca mahāphalam /
GSP33nysu__3u:13304: ato bahūnāṃ grahaṇāyāviṣkāreṇa jñānadānaṃ kāryamiti prāpte siddhāntamāha- evamapīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:13308: tathāpi nāviṣkāreṇa kāryaṃ kuta ityata āha- pātramiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:13326: jñānaṃ dṛṣṭaphalaṃ proktaṃ muktiścehaiva labhyate // MAnuv_3,4.257 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13328: prārabdhasya karmaṇo 'virodhenaiva jñānaṃ dṛṣṭaphalaṃ proktamiti prathamādhikaraṇatātparyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:13329: dṛṣṭaṃ ca tatphalaṃ ceti dṛṣṭaphalam śravaṇādisampūrtyanantarameva jñānamutpadyate /
